### Latest articles ğŸ“°

The newest additions from our guides, reference info, tutorials, and deep dives:

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

library(yaml)

dirs <- c("how_to_guides", "reference_info", "tutorials", "deep_dives")

read_meta <- function(path) {
  lines <- readLines(path, warn = FALSE)
  if (length(lines) < 2 || lines[1] != "---") return(list())
  end <- which(lines[-1] == "---")
  if (!length(end)) return(list())
  # adjust because we searched lines[-1]
  end_idx <- end[1] + 1
  yaml_text <- paste(lines[2:end_idx], collapse = "\n")
  tryCatch(yaml::yaml.load(yaml_text), error = function(...) list())
}

`%||%` <- function(a, b) if (is.null(a) || is.na(a)) b else a

collect_entries <- function() {
  files <- unlist(lapply(dirs, function(d) {
    list.files(d, pattern = "\\.qmd$", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)
  }))
  if (length(files) == 0) {
    return(data.frame(path = character(), title = character(), date = as.Date(character())))
  }
  entries <- lapply(files, function(f) {
    meta <- read_meta(f)
    title <- meta$title %||% tools::toTitleCase(gsub("-", " ", tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(f))))
    date_val <- meta$date
    if (is.null(date_val) || length(date_val) == 0) date_val <- NA
    date_parsed <- suppressWarnings(as.Date(date_val))
    if (length(date_parsed) == 0 || is.na(date_parsed)) date_parsed <- as.Date(file.info(f)$mtime)
    list(path = f, title = title, date = date_parsed)
  })
  do.call(rbind, lapply(entries, as.data.frame))
}

df <- collect_entries()
if (!nrow(df)) {
  cat("- No articles found yet.\n")
  knitr::knit_exit()
}
df <- df[order(df$date, decreasing = TRUE), ]
df <- head(df, 5)

for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
  rel <- gsub("\\.qmd$", ".html", df$path[i])
  cat(sprintf("- [%s](%s) â€” %s\n", df$title[i], rel, format(as.Date(df$date[i]), "%Y-%m-%d")))
}
```
